description:
TMF Clients is a TMF-630 compliant generic client implementation which uses Spring Webflux
    to communicate with a TMF compliant backend.

    The following features are provided out of the box:
    - Uses the dynamically decomposable opentmf-v4-models library for the hierarchical TMF model classes.
    - Supports dnext-opentmf-v4-models and similar model extensions.
    - Ability to use any configured opentmf-web-clients for dynamic access token retrieval
    - Ability to specify only the requested columns
    - Ability to apply a jsonPath at server-side or client-side
    - Ability to retrieve a payload as the desired object type
    - Ability to retrieve one page, all pages at once, or any desired page at a time
    - Provides methods with and without access token parameters
    - Follows TMF-630 recommendations.
